GirlCode1.GirlCode_Details: Her ex is off-limits forever. No guy is worth losing your best friend over.

GirlCode2.GirlCode_Details: What she tells you about him stays between you two. Loyalty over gossip, always.

GirlCode3.GirlCode_Details: If you see a red flag in her dating life, speak up—with love and honesty.

GirlCode4.GirlCode_Title: Hype Her Up, Don't Tear Her Down
GirlCode4.GirlCode_Details: Celebrate her wins, support her glow-up, and never compete with her for male attention.

GirlCode5.GirlCode_Details: If a guy is trying to cut her off from friends and family, that's a dealbreaker. Call it out.

GirlCode6.GirlCode_Title: Split the Bill or Offer to Pay
GirlCode6.GirlCode_Details: Financial independence matters. Never feel obligated to let a man pay if it makes you uncomfortable.

GirlCode7.GirlCode_Details: If something feels off about him, it probably is. Your intuition is your superpower—don't ignore it.

GirlCode8.GirlCode_Title: Have Each Other's Backs on Dates
GirlCode8.GirlCode_Details: Check-ins during dates, safe words for group hangouts, and always prioritize her safety over politeness.

GirlCode9.GirlCode_Details: Know your worth and let him put in the effort. A man worth having will show up for you consistently.

GirlCode10.GirlCode_Details: No relationship is worth your mental health, self-respect, or happiness. It's okay to walk away and start fresh.

GirlCode11.GirlCode_Details: Sporadic texts and last-minute plans aren't dating. You deserve consistency and intentionality.

GirlCode12.GirlCode_Details: Whether it's a joke that lands wrong or behavior that crosses the line, address it in the moment.

GirlCode13.GirlCode_Title: Don't Loan Money to Romantic Partners
GirlCode13.GirlCode_Details: Money and romance mix poorly. If he can't afford something, that's his problem to solve.

GirlCode14.GirlCode_Details: Let your close friends know where you're going on dates and who you're with for safety.

GirlCode15.GirlCode_Details: Having dealbreakers isn't being picky—it's being smart about what you accept in your life.

GirlCode16.GirlCode_Title: Don't Play Games to Keep Him Interested
GirlCode16.GirlCode_Details: If you have to pretend to be someone else or play hard to get, he's not the one.

GirlCode17.GirlCode_Title: Watch How He Treats Service Workers
GirlCode17.GirlCode_Details: A man's character shows in how he treats people who can't do anything for him.

GirlCode18.GirlCode_Details: If he's lied once, cheated once, or been disrespectful once, that's usually not the last time.

GirlCode19.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Career Over Her Relationship
GirlCode19.GirlCode_Details: A good man will lift her up professionally. Never encourage her to choose a guy over her dreams.

GirlCode20.GirlCode_Details: Your quirks, ambitions, and personality are features, not bugs. The right person will love all of you.

GirlCode21.GirlCode_Title: Know the Difference Between Love and Convenience
GirlCode21.GirlCode_Details: Just because he's comfortable doesn't mean he loves you. Real love includes effort and growth.

GirlCode22.GirlCode_Details: If you're fighting other women for his time, he's not worth fighting for.

GirlCode23.GirlCode_Details: Sometimes people we love see red flags we're too close to notice. Stay open to their perspective.

GirlCode24.GirlCode_Details: Don't assume you're exclusive. Have the conversation and make sure you're on the same page.

GirlCode25.GirlCode_Details: Your ambition, intelligence, and confidence are attractive. Never downplay them to make him comfortable.

GirlCode26.GirlCode_Details: You don't owe anyone access to your body, time, or energy. A boundary is enough.

GirlCode27.GirlCode_Details: Words are easy. Real apologies come with changed behavior over time.

GirlCode28.GirlCode_Title: Check In With Her During Relationship Issues
GirlCode28.GirlCode_Details: When she's going through a breakup or relationship drama, show up consistently and listen without judgment.

GirlCode29.GirlCode_Details: He's not a fixer-upper project. Love him for who he is now, not who he might become.

GirlCode30.GirlCode_Title: Know That Trauma Bonding Isn't Love
GirlCode30.GirlCode_Details: Going through drama together doesn't mean you're compatible. Real love is built on stability and respect.

GirlCode31.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Rewrite Your Narrative
GirlCode31.GirlCode_Details: If he constantly contradicts your memories or experiences, that's manipulation. Trust yourself.

GirlCode32.GirlCode_Details: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person. Enjoy your independence and freedom.

GirlCode33.GirlCode_Details: He should show up for you in meaningful ways, not just romantically. Check his actions, not his words.

GirlCode34.GirlCode_Details: Don't engage with his exes, his family drama, or unnecessary conflict. Your energy is precious.

GirlCode35.GirlCode_Details: If he's always on his phone around you, he's not present. You deserve full attention.

GirlCode36.GirlCode_Details: Stop hinting and guessing. Clear communication prevents misunderstandings and wasted time.

GirlCode37.GirlCode_Details: He texting back doesn't deserve a medal. Set the bar higher than basic human decency.

GirlCode38.GirlCode_Details: Does he communicate or shut down? Does he take responsibility or blame you? His conflict style matters.

GirlCode39.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Rush the Relationship
GirlCode39.GirlCode_Details: Love-bombing and moving fast are red flags. Healthy relationships develop at a sustainable pace.

GirlCode40.GirlCode_Details: Never become financially dependent on a partner. Keep your own income, savings, and resources.

GirlCode41.GirlCode_Details: A possessive, controlling man isn't protecting you—he's owning you. That's not love.

GirlCode42.GirlCode_Title: Listen When She Says He's Bad News
GirlCode42.GirlCode_Details: If your bestie sees something you don't, take it seriously. She might be the voice of reason you need.

GirlCode43.GirlCode_Details: After a few months, if he won't define the relationship, he's deciding for you. Choose clarity and walk away.

GirlCode44.GirlCode_Details: Whether she's taking time to heal or rushing into love, support her journey without judgment.

GirlCode45.GirlCode_Details: If he drinks excessively, uses drugs, or has addictive behaviors, that's a dealbreaker. You can't fix it.

GirlCode46.GirlCode_Details: Chemistry and love matter, but so do values, goals, and compatibility. Passion fades without a solid foundation.

GirlCode47.GirlCode_Details: Giving you the cold shoulder is manipulation. Demand communication or remove yourself from the situation.

GirlCode48.GirlCode_Title: Check His Relationship With His Mother
GirlCode48.GirlCode_Details: How he treats the main woman in his life reveals how he'll eventually treat you.

GirlCode49.GirlCode_Title: Don't Share Your Passwords or Codes
GirlCode49.GirlCode_Details: Privacy isn't secrecy. Keep your personal accounts and information to yourself for your own protection.

GirlCode50.GirlCode_Details: His past relationships matter. Ask about breakups, patterns, and what he learned. His answers reveal character.

GirlCode51.GirlCode_Title: Don't Sacrifice Sleep for Late-Night Texts
GirlCode51.GirlCode_Details: If he only wants to talk late at night, that's intentional. He's not prioritizing quality time with you.

GirlCode52.GirlCode_Details: If she decides to end it, celebrate her strength. Never pressure her to stay or take him back.

GirlCode53.GirlCode_Details: Check his social media behavior. Is he respectful? Does he have shady follows? Trust what you see.

GirlCode54.GirlCode_Title: Know That Great Sex Isn't a Relationship
GirlCode54.GirlCode_Details: Chemistry in bed doesn't mean compatibility in life. Don't confuse passion with partnership.

GirlCode55.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Control Your Circle
GirlCode55.GirlCode_Details: A good man wants you to have friends and life outside the relationship. Isolation is a control tactic.

GirlCode56.GirlCode_Details: Does he want marriage, kids, stability? Make sure his vision aligns with yours before investing deeper.

GirlCode57.GirlCode_Details: Confused feelings are usually someone keeping options open. Clarity is a bare minimum.

GirlCode58.GirlCode_Details: After heartbreak, show up consistently. Remind her of her worth and help her find herself again.

GirlCode59.GirlCode_Title: Don't Overlook How He Speaks About Women
GirlCode59.GirlCode_Details: Misogynistic jokes, disrespectful commentary about women—these aren't harmless. They reveal his worldview.

GirlCode60.GirlCode_Title: Trust the Relationship Feedback You Get
GirlCode60.GirlCode_Details: If multiple people express concern about your relationship, listen. Sometimes outside perspective is clarity.

GirlCode61.GirlCode_Details: If he 'doesn't know how' to do basic tasks to avoid responsibility, that's deliberate. Don't fall for it.

GirlCode62.GirlCode_Details: Taking time for herself isn't selfish. Encourage her to prioritize mental health and personal growth.

GirlCode63.GirlCode_Details: A man drowning in debt or spending recklessly will drag you down. Money habits reveal character.

GirlCode64.GirlCode_Details: Does he maintain friendships? Is he loyal to his friends? These patterns translate to romantic relationships.

GirlCode65.GirlCode_Details: Grand gestures and expensive gifts don't erase hurt. Actions and consistency matter more.

GirlCode66.GirlCode_Details: If he's threatened by her success or friends, that's his issue to work on, not hers to manage.

GirlCode67.GirlCode_Title: Don't Date Men Who Disrespect Their Mothers
GirlCode67.GirlCode_Details: If he speaks harshly about his mom, he'll eventually speak that way about you too.

GirlCode68.GirlCode_Details: Before investing time, be clear about what you need: commitment, honesty, respect, emotional availability.

GirlCode69.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Gaslight Your Feelings
GirlCode69.GirlCode_Details: Your emotions are valid. If he dismisses how you feel, that's disrespect disguised as logic.

GirlCode70.GirlCode_Title: Be Honest When She's Making a Mistake
GirlCode70.GirlCode_Details: Real friendship means speaking hard truths with compassion, not just telling her what she wants to hear.

GirlCode71.GirlCode_Details: If you're always the one planning dates, texting first, and initiating, you're dating alone.

GirlCode72.GirlCode_Details: Excessive compliments, declarations of love too early, and overwhelming attention are manipulation tactics.

GirlCode73.GirlCode_Details: If a relationship is causing anxiety, depression, or constant stress, it's toxic. Leave.

GirlCode74.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That Alone Is Better Than Wrong
GirlCode74.GirlCode_Details: Single life is freedom. An unhappy relationship is a prison. Help her see that.

GirlCode75.GirlCode_Details: He shouldn't love you only when you're happy, thin, quiet, or convenient. Real love is unconditional.

GirlCode76.GirlCode_Details: Does he have a pattern of short relationships, toxic exes, or always playing the victim? That's a tell.

GirlCode77.GirlCode_Details: If he's paranoid, controlling, or suspicious early on, it won't improve. That's his baggage to unpack.

GirlCode78.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Through the Messy Middle
GirlCode78.GirlCode_Details: Healing isn't linear. Be patient when she's processing emotions from a breakup.

GirlCode79.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Disrespect Dressed as Humor
GirlCode79.GirlCode_Details: If he belittles you and laughs it off as a joke, that's emotional abuse. Don't normalize it.

GirlCode80.GirlCode_Details: He might be smart, talented, or attractive, but potential means nothing without effort and follow-through.

GirlCode81.GirlCode_Details: Just because you've been together a while doesn't mean you should accept less. Standards don't expire.

GirlCode82.GirlCode_Details: If he has freedoms he won't give you, that's inequality. You deserve the same respect and autonomy.

GirlCode83.GirlCode_Details: Phrases like 'eventually' or 'maybe someday' about the future mean he's not serious. Move on.

GirlCode84.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Solo Travels and Adventures
GirlCode84.GirlCode_Details: Independence strengthens her. Encourage her to explore the world and know herself better.

GirlCode85.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Blame for His Actions
GirlCode85.GirlCode_Details: He cheated, lied, or hurt you because of his choices, not because of anything you did or didn't do.

GirlCode86.GirlCode_Title: Check How He Treats People He Disagrees With
GirlCode86.GirlCode_Details: Kindness in disagreement shows maturity. Hostility and contempt are warning signs.

GirlCode87.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Him Redefine Your Boundaries
GirlCode87.GirlCode_Details: Once you set a boundary, hold it. Don't let him negotiate or manipulate you into changing it.

GirlCode88.GirlCode_Title: Be the Friend She Needs During Heartbreak
GirlCode88.GirlCode_Details: Listen without fixing, validate without judging, and remind her of who she was before him.

GirlCode89.GirlCode_Details: He should be investing emotionally, mentally, and physically in the relationship, not just showing up.

GirlCode90.GirlCode_Title: Know That Chemistry Fades Without Respect
GirlCode90.GirlCode_Details: Attraction and passion need respect as a foundation, or they'll eventually disappear entirely.

GirlCode91.GirlCode_Title: Don't Overlook Substance in Pursuit of Style
GirlCode91.GirlCode_Details: Good looks, money, and charm don't equal a good man. Character and integrity matter most.

GirlCode92.GirlCode_Details: If he talks about a future together but never makes concrete plans, he's stringing you along.

GirlCode93.GirlCode_Details: If he disappears when things get serious or runs from difficult conversations, he's emotionally unavailable.

GirlCode94.GirlCode_Title: Respect Her Choice to Stay Single
GirlCode94.GirlCode_Details: Not everyone needs a relationship. If she's happy alone, celebrate that instead of pushing dates.

GirlCode95.GirlCode_Details: If he cheated on past partners, he's shown you who he is. Believe him and move on.

GirlCode96.GirlCode_Details: Can he identify and express emotions? Is he self-aware? Emotional maturity is non-negotiable.

GirlCode97.GirlCode_Title: Don't Stay Because of Time Already Invested
GirlCode97.GirlCode_Details: Sunk cost fallacy is real, but wasting more time won't change the past. Cut losses and move forward.

GirlCode98.GirlCode_Title: Help Her Recognize Her Own Worth
GirlCode98.GirlCode_Details: Constantly remind her that she's valuable, deserving, and enough—exactly as she is right now.

GirlCode99.GirlCode_Details: If he's resentful about your career, friends, or hobbies, that's possessiveness, not love.

GirlCode100.GirlCode_Title: Know That Your Happiness Comes First
GirlCode100.GirlCode_Details: You can't pour from an empty cup. Prioritize your wellbeing, dreams, and peace above any relationship.

GirlCode101.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore Red Flags for the Sake of Companionship
GirlCode101.GirlCode_Details: Fear of being alone is never a reason to stay with someone who doesn't serve you.

GirlCode102.GirlCode_Title: Show Up Consistently for Her Wins
GirlCode102.GirlCode_Details: Career promotions, personal achievements, fitness goals—celebrate them all like they're your own.

GirlCode103.GirlCode_Details: Grand romantic gestures mean nothing if everyday care is missing. Consistency matters more than spectacle.

GirlCode104.GirlCode_Details: You can love someone deeply and still not be right for each other. That's okay and it's valid.

GirlCode105.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Her Dim Her Light
GirlCode105.GirlCode_Details: If a man asks her to be smaller, quieter, or less ambitious, he's trying to control her. Protect her.

GirlCode106.GirlCode_Details: Does he respect boundaries or get defensive? How he handles 'no' reveals his character.

GirlCode107.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Comparison to His Exes
GirlCode107.GirlCode_Details: Whether favorably or unfavorably, you shouldn't be measured against his past. You're your own person.

GirlCode108.GirlCode_Details: When she's making excuses for him, gently point out what you're seeing. Love doesn't require blindness.

GirlCode109.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore Early Signs of Controlling Behavior
GirlCode109.GirlCode_Details: Monitoring your location, questioning your friendships, or checking your phone—these are abuse precursors.

GirlCode110.GirlCode_Title: Know That You Deserve Effort, Not Excuses
GirlCode110.GirlCode_Details: A man who wants to be with you will make time, communicate, and show up. No excuses.

GirlCode111.GirlCode_Details: If he can't give you specifics about the future, he's keeping his options open. Demand clarity.

GirlCode112.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Breaking Her Own Cycles
GirlCode112.GirlCode_Details: When she chooses differently or sets new boundaries, acknowledge her growth and strength.

GirlCode113.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Reaction to Your Success
GirlCode113.GirlCode_Details: A secure man will be proud and supportive. Jealousy or dismissal is a major red flag.

GirlCode114.GirlCode_Title: Know That Trauma Doesn't Excuse Behavior
GirlCode114.GirlCode_Details: His past pain explains things but doesn't justify hurting you. He needs to do the work.

GirlCode115.GirlCode_Title: Don't Stay in a Relationship Out of Pity
GirlCode115.GirlCode_Details: Feeling sorry for him isn't a foundation for love. You deserve to be with someone you're excited about.

GirlCode116.GirlCode_Title: Watch How He Handles Your Achievements
GirlCode116.GirlCode_Details: Does he celebrate you or minimize your wins? His reaction shows his true feelings about your success.

GirlCode117.GirlCode_Details: Infrequent messages, delayed responses, and one-word replies aren't dating. That's neglect.

GirlCode118.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That Loyalty Goes Both Ways
GirlCode118.GirlCode_Details: She shouldn't be the only one fighting for the relationship. He needs to show up too.

GirlCode119.GirlCode_Details: If your core beliefs differ on religion, family, or life goals, that's not something love conquers.

GirlCode120.GirlCode_Title: Know That Your Intuition Is Your Protector
GirlCode120.GirlCode_Details: If something feels wrong before you have proof, trust that feeling. Your gut is wiser than you think.

GirlCode121.GirlCode_Details: When he's inconsistent—sometimes loving, sometimes cold—you'll chase to get that good feeling back. That's manipulation.

GirlCode122.GirlCode_Details: When she's unsure about a guy, help her see clearly without judgment. Sometimes we need someone outside to see truth.

GirlCode123.GirlCode_Details: Yelling, throwing things, or aggressive behavior isn't passion—it's a warning sign of abuse.

GirlCode124.GirlCode_Title: Ask About His Relationship With Money
GirlCode124.GirlCode_Details: Is he generous or selfish? Does he save or spend recklessly? Money habits show priorities.

GirlCode125.GirlCode_Title: Don't Stay Because You've Already Invested
GirlCode125.GirlCode_Details: Months or years invested doesn't mean you owe him more of your future. Future investments matter most.

GirlCode126.GirlCode_Title: Help Her See That Attachment Isn't Love
GirlCode126.GirlCode_Details: Fear of being alone, habit, or comfort isn't love. Real love feels safe and expanding, not desperate.

GirlCode127.GirlCode_Details: If he's honest sometimes but lies about big or small things, he's a liar. Honesty isn't selective.

GirlCode128.GirlCode_Details: If he's sweet initially then becomes critical and cold, that's a calculated tactic, not a mood shift.

GirlCode129.GirlCode_Title: Don't Let Fear Keep You in the Wrong Relationship
GirlCode129.GirlCode_Details: Fear of starting over, being alone, or failure—don't let these fears trap you.

GirlCode130.GirlCode_Details: When she leaves a toxic situation, be her biggest cheerleader. That takes courage.

GirlCode131.GirlCode_Details: Drunk, stressed, or tired—disrespect is still disrespect. It's a choice.

GirlCode132.GirlCode_Title: Know That Shared Struggles Aren't Compatibility
GirlCode132.GirlCode_Details: Surviving hard times together doesn't mean you belong together. Compatibility needs more than adversity.

GirlCode133.GirlCode_Details: If he won't open up, process emotions, or be vulnerable, he can't meet your emotional needs.

GirlCode134.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Mirror When She's Losing Herself
GirlCode134.GirlCode_Details: If she's changing who she is for him, gently reflect back who she used to be.

GirlCode135.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Need for 'Space' as Connection
GirlCode135.GirlCode_Details: Healthy relationships involve togetherness and intimacy, not constant distance.

GirlCode136.GirlCode_Title: Ask How He Talks About His Exes
GirlCode136.GirlCode_Details: Does he trash them all or speak respectfully? How he discusses past partners predicts how he'll discuss you.

GirlCode137.GirlCode_Details: Refusing to communicate or shutting down is emotional abuse. It's a form of control and punishment.

GirlCode138.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That Staying Isn't Love
GirlCode138.GirlCode_Details: Tolerating someone who disrespects you isn't loyalty—it's self-abandonment.

GirlCode139.GirlCode_Details: If he's always pointing out what's wrong with you, that's eroding your self-esteem intentionally.

GirlCode140.GirlCode_Title: Know That Real Men Don't Need to Prove Themselves
GirlCode140.GirlCode_Details: A secure man shows up consistently without needing you to beg or convince him.

GirlCode141.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Boundaries While He Violates Yours
GirlCode141.GirlCode_Details: Healthy relationships have mutual respect for boundaries, not one-sided demands.

GirlCode142.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Therapy and Healing Work
GirlCode142.GirlCode_Details: When she's doing the work to understand herself better, celebrate that growth.

GirlCode143.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore Patterns in His Communication
GirlCode143.GirlCode_Details: Does he only text late? Only call when he needs something? Patterns reveal priorities.

GirlCode144.GirlCode_Title: Know That You Don't Need Permission to Leave
GirlCode144.GirlCode_Details: You don't need his agreement or understanding. Your decision to go is enough.

GirlCode145.GirlCode_Details: When he hurts you, he should take responsibility, not flip it to make you the bad guy.

GirlCode146.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Safe Space to Vent
GirlCode146.GirlCode_Details: Let her express doubts, frustrations, and fears without judgment. That's what friends do.

GirlCode147.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Social Media Behavior
GirlCode147.GirlCode_Details: Liking other women's photos, inappropriate comments, or hiding you from posts—that's disrespect.

GirlCode148.GirlCode_Title: Know That Love Doesn't Require Suffering
GirlCode148.GirlCode_Details: If loving him means constant pain, sacrifice, or compromise of your values, it's not real love.

GirlCode149.GirlCode_Details: Public displays of affection don't matter if he ignores you in private. Real love is consistent.

GirlCode150.GirlCode_Details: The relationship she builds with herself is the most important. Encourage her to fall in love with her own life.

GirlCode151.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore Red Flags Just Because He's Attractive
GirlCode151.GirlCode_Details: Looks fade and don't fix behavior. A beautiful package with an ugly inside is still empty.

GirlCode152.GirlCode_Title: Ask About His Vision for You Two
GirlCode152.GirlCode_Details: Does he see a future with you? Can he articulate what that looks like? Vagueness is a warning.

GirlCode153.GirlCode_Details: Busy doesn't mean ignoring you completely. A man who cares will find time.

GirlCode154.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That She's Allowed to Change Her Mind
GirlCode154.GirlCode_Details: If she thought she wanted forever with him but changed her mind, that's valid. She's allowed to evolve.

GirlCode155.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Resistance to Commitment
GirlCode155.GirlCode_Details: After months of dating, if he won't commit or discuss the future, he's already answered the question.

GirlCode156.GirlCode_Title: Know That Vulnerability Is Strength, Not Weakness
GirlCode156.GirlCode_Details: A man who can be vulnerable and honest is showing maturity, not softness.

GirlCode157.GirlCode_Details: Love shouldn't come with strings attached or expectations of repayment. That's manipulation.

GirlCode158.GirlCode_Title: Be the Friend Who Doesn't Abandon Her
GirlCode158.GirlCode_Details: Whether she's in a relationship or single, be consistently there. Don't disappear into coupledom.

GirlCode159.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Talks Down to You
GirlCode159.GirlCode_Details: Condescension disguised as teaching or explaining is belittling. You're not a child.

GirlCode160.GirlCode_Title: Know That You Deserve Someone Who's Sure About You
GirlCode160.GirlCode_Details: Stop trying to convince someone to love you. The right person won't need convincing.

GirlCode161.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Reluctance to Meet Your People
GirlCode161.GirlCode_Details: If he avoids meeting your friends and family after months, he's hiding something or not serious.

GirlCode162.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Breaking Free From Codependency
GirlCode162.GirlCode_Details: When she stops needing validation from a man, that's a major win. Amplify that shift.

GirlCode163.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Prioritizes Everything Over You
GirlCode163.GirlCode_Details: Work, friends, hobbies—these matter, but you should be a priority, not an afterthought.

GirlCode164.GirlCode_Title: Know That Your Body Is Your Own
GirlCode164.GirlCode_Details: Never let him pressure you into sex or override your comfort. Consent is always mandatory.

GirlCode165.GirlCode_Details: Small disrespects add up. Don't normalize comments about your body, appearance, or intelligence.

GirlCode166.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Cheerleader for New Beginnings
GirlCode166.GirlCode_Details: When she starts fresh—new job, new city, new life—show up and celebrate her bravery.

GirlCode167.GirlCode_Details: If he monitors your spending, controls your paycheck, or demands access to your accounts, that's abuse.

GirlCode168.GirlCode_Title: Ask About His Relationship With Therapy
GirlCode168.GirlCode_Details: Is he open to growth? Has he done therapy work? Someone avoiding self-work will stagnate.

GirlCode169.GirlCode_Details: When he calls you crazy for having emotions or boundaries, that's gaslighting. Trust your sanity.

GirlCode170.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That Loneliness Isn't Love
GirlCode170.GirlCode_Details: Being lonely doesn't make a wrong person right. Being alone is better than being with the wrong one.

GirlCode171.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Compares You to Others
GirlCode171.GirlCode_Details: Comparing you to his exes, celebrities, or friends is disrespectful and designed to make you feel small.

GirlCode172.GirlCode_Details: Your emotional, physical, and mental needs are valid. Don't shrink them to accommodate him.

GirlCode173.GirlCode_Details: Once is a mistake, twice is a pattern, three times is a choice. Stop believing his words if actions don't follow.

GirlCode174.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Decision to Invest in Herself
GirlCode174.GirlCode_Details: Whether it's therapy, education, or hobbies—when she invests in herself, that's the best relationship.

GirlCode175.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Inability to Apologize Properly
GirlCode175.GirlCode_Details: Real apologies include acknowledgment, understanding, and commitment to change. Anything less is manipulation.

GirlCode176.GirlCode_Title: Know That You're Not Responsible for His Emotions
GirlCode176.GirlCode_Details: His happiness, sadness, or anger is his to manage. You're not his emotional support animal.

GirlCode177.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Need for You to 'Prove' Love
GirlCode177.GirlCode_Details: Real love doesn't require constant proof. It's shown through consistent actions and presence.

GirlCode178.GirlCode_Title: Be There When She's Rebuilding Her Identity
GirlCode178.GirlCode_Details: After a breakup, she might not know who she is. Help her rediscover her passions and dreams.

GirlCode179.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Threatens to Leave
GirlCode179.GirlCode_Details: If he uses 'I'm leaving' as a manipulation tactic, call his bluff. Don't let threats control you.

GirlCode180.GirlCode_Details: If you can't talk openly about problems, you'll never resolve them. Communication is essential.

GirlCode181.GirlCode_Details: One text per week or occasional compliments aren't love. You deserve consistent affection.

GirlCode182.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Saying No Without Explanation
GirlCode182.GirlCode_Details: When she sets boundaries without justifying them, that's growth. Protect that power.

GirlCode183.GirlCode_Details: Substance abuse, gambling, or porn addiction—these won't disappear with love. He needs professional help.

GirlCode184.GirlCode_Title: Ask About His Relationship With His Siblings
GirlCode184.GirlCode_Details: Does he maintain family relationships? Is he loyal and supportive? Family dynamics reveal character.

GirlCode185.GirlCode_Details: After a few months, if he won't define what you are, you're not his girlfriend. Move on.

GirlCode186.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That She's Enough as She Is
GirlCode186.GirlCode_Details: She doesn't need a man to complete her. She's whole, worthy, and capable alone.

GirlCode187.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Flirts With Others
GirlCode187.GirlCode_Details: If he's openly flirting or crossing boundaries with other women, he's disrespecting you.

GirlCode188.GirlCode_Title: Know That Your Standards Aren't Too High
GirlCode188.GirlCode_Details: Wanting respect, effort, and honesty isn't asking too much. Don't lower your standards for anyone.

GirlCode189.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Anger as Passion
GirlCode189.GirlCode_Details: Explosiveness and volatility aren't signs of depth. They're signs of instability.

GirlCode190.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Safe Harbor During Storms
GirlCode190.GirlCode_Details: When her world is falling apart, be the constant, steady presence she can rely on.

GirlCode191.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore Red Flags Because of Good Moments
GirlCode191.GirlCode_Details: A few good dates don't erase concerning behavior. Consistency matters more than moments.

GirlCode192.GirlCode_Title: Know That Forgiveness Doesn't Mean Staying
GirlCode192.GirlCode_Details: You can forgive him and still leave. Forgiveness is for you, not an excuse to remain.

GirlCode193.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Gaslighting About Your Memories
GirlCode193.GirlCode_Details: If he denies things that happened or makes you question your memory, that's psychological abuse.

GirlCode194.GirlCode_Details: Even if leaving was right, it can still hurt. Let her process the loss without toxic positivity.

GirlCode195.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Disrespect Toward Sex Workers
GirlCode195.GirlCode_Details: How he views and speaks about sex workers reveals his respect for women's autonomy.

GirlCode196.GirlCode_Title: Know That Love Should Feel Safe
GirlCode196.GirlCode_Details: Real love doesn't include walking on eggshells, anxiety, or constant worry.

GirlCode197.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Unwillingness to Compromise
GirlCode197.GirlCode_Details: Healthy relationships require both people to bend. If he won't, he's selfish.

GirlCode198.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Creating Boundaries With Family
GirlCode198.GirlCode_Details: If she's setting limits with toxic family members, support her fiercely. That takes strength.

GirlCode199.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Dismisses Your Career
GirlCode199.GirlCode_Details: Your job, education, and ambitions matter. A supportive partner will celebrate, not diminish them.

GirlCode200.GirlCode_Title: Know That You Deserve Someone Who Chooses You Daily
GirlCode200.GirlCode_Details: Love isn't a one-time decision. He should choose you, your happiness, and your wellbeing every single day.

GirlCode201.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Breadcrumbs as a Love Language
GirlCode201.GirlCode_Details: Occasional check-ins and rare dates aren't romance. Love shows up consistently and intentionally.

GirlCode202.GirlCode_Title: Remind Her That Healing Takes Time
GirlCode202.GirlCode_Details: There's no timeline for getting over heartbreak. Support her patience with herself.

GirlCode203.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Makes You Feel Small
GirlCode203.GirlCode_Details: Whether through jokes, comments, or actions—if he makes you feel less than, that's emotional abuse.

GirlCode204.GirlCode_Title: Know That Your Gut Feeling Is Your Inner Wisdom
GirlCode204.GirlCode_Details: Before you have facts, your intuition senses danger. Listen to that voice inside.

GirlCode205.GirlCode_Details: A man who constantly cancels, shows up late, or forgets plans isn't prioritizing you.

GirlCode206.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Witness to Her Own Strength
GirlCode206.GirlCode_Details: When she doubts herself, remind her of what she's survived and overcome.

GirlCode207.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Obsession With Controlling Image
GirlCode207.GirlCode_Details: If he's overly concerned with how you look or dress around others, that's about control.

GirlCode208.GirlCode_Title: Know That Mistakes Can Be Dealbreakers
GirlCode208.GirlCode_Details: One serious transgression doesn't always deserve a second chance. You get to decide your threshold.

GirlCode209.GirlCode_Details: Hot and cold behavior keeps you off-balance and fighting for his attention. That's toxic.

GirlCode210.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Reclaiming Her Life Post-Breakup
GirlCode210.GirlCode_Details: New hobbies, new friends, new adventures—celebrate her building a life that excites her.

GirlCode211.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Checks Your Phone
GirlCode211.GirlCode_Details: Monitoring your communications is invasion of privacy and a sign of controlling behavior.

GirlCode212.GirlCode_Details: A partner should be open about his life, friends, and whereabouts. Secrecy breeds distrust.

GirlCode213.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Lack of Ambition
GirlCode213.GirlCode_Details: You can't pour all your energy into lifting him up. He needs his own drive and goals.

GirlCode214.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Choosing Her Mental Health
GirlCode214.GirlCode_Details: When she prioritizes therapy, meditation, or self-care over a relationship, that's wisdom.

GirlCode215.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore Disrespect Disguised as Jokes
GirlCode215.GirlCode_Details: If a 'joke' makes you uncomfortable and he won't stop, it's intentional disrespect.

GirlCode216.GirlCode_Title: Know That Apologies Without Change Are Manipulation
GirlCode216.GirlCode_Details: He says sorry but repeats the same behavior. That's not remorse—it's a strategy.

GirlCode217.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Discomfort With Your Success
GirlCode217.GirlCode_Details: A real man celebrates your wins. His insecurity about your achievements isn't your problem.

GirlCode218.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Reality When She's Lost in Fantasy
GirlCode218.GirlCode_Details: When she's making excuses for him, gently bring her back to what she's actually experiencing.

GirlCode219.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Resistance to Building a Future
GirlCode219.GirlCode_Details: If he won't talk about next year or has no plans, he's not planning to have you in his life.

GirlCode220.GirlCode_Details: No one is worth compromising your dignity. Keep your self-respect above all else.

GirlCode221.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Blame for His Infidelity
GirlCode221.GirlCode_Details: His cheating isn't about what you did or didn't do. It's about his character and choices.

GirlCode222.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Setting Boundaries With Exes
GirlCode222.GirlCode_Details: If she's cutting contact with an ex, back her up. She knows what she needs.

GirlCode223.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Weaponizes Your Insecurities
GirlCode223.GirlCode_Details: If he uses your vulnerabilities against you, that's psychological abuse.

GirlCode224.GirlCode_Title: Know That You Shouldn't Have to Ask for Basic Respect
GirlCode224.GirlCode_Details: Respect should be automatic. If you're constantly asking for it, he doesn't value you.

GirlCode225.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Inability to Take Criticism
GirlCode225.GirlCode_Details: If he can't hear feedback without becoming defensive, he'll never grow or improve.

GirlCode226.GirlCode_Details: When she recognizes her own role in dysfunction and changes it, that's self-awareness and growth.

GirlCode227.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Disrespect Toward Your Family
GirlCode227.GirlCode_Details: How he treats your loved ones matters. Rudeness or dismissal is a red flag.

GirlCode228.GirlCode_Details: Missing someone or wanting them doesn't make a toxic relationship worth saving.

GirlCode229.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Refusal to Discuss Problems
GirlCode229.GirlCode_Details: Avoidance of difficult conversations means nothing ever gets resolved.

GirlCode230.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Constant When Everything Is Changing
GirlCode230.GirlCode_Details: Through relationships, breakups, and life changes—be the friend who stays steady.

GirlCode231.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Compares Your Body
GirlCode231.GirlCode_Details: Comments about your weight, appearance, or comparing you to others is body shaming.

GirlCode232.GirlCode_Title: Know That Your Feelings Are Valid
GirlCode232.GirlCode_Details: Don't let him convince you that your emotions are wrong or irrational. Feel what you feel.

GirlCode233.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Reluctance to Introduce You
GirlCode233.GirlCode_Details: After months, if he hasn't introduced you to important people, you're a secret.

GirlCode234.GirlCode_Details: Whether it's spiritual growth, career changes, or personal evolution—celebrate her transformation.

GirlCode235.GirlCode_Details: Small lies today become big lies tomorrow. Address dishonesty immediately.

GirlCode236.GirlCode_Title: Know That You're Allowed to Want More
GirlCode236.GirlCode_Details: Wanting commitment, effort, or honesty isn't demanding. It's having standards.

GirlCode237.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Need to Control Your Appearance
GirlCode237.GirlCode_Details: Your body, your style, your hair—these are your choices. His opinions don't overrule your autonomy.

GirlCode238.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Voice When She's Lost Hers
GirlCode238.GirlCode_Details: If manipulation has silenced her, help her find her voice again.

GirlCode239.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore When He Isolates You From Friends
GirlCode239.GirlCode_Details: Subtle comments about your friends or making you feel bad for spending time with them is isolation.

GirlCode240.GirlCode_Title: Know That Moving On Is an Act of Self-Love
GirlCode240.GirlCode_Details: Letting go of someone who doesn't serve you is the most loving thing you can do for yourself.

GirlCode241.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Expectation of Perfection
GirlCode241.GirlCode_Details: You're human. You'll make mistakes. A loving partner accepts your flaws.

GirlCode242.GirlCode_Title: Celebrate Her Standing in Her Power
GirlCode242.GirlCode_Details: When she stops seeking validation and starts trusting herself, that's a transformation.

GirlCode243.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Minimization of Your Feelings
GirlCode243.GirlCode_Details: Saying things like 'you're overreacting' or 'it's not that serious' dismisses your valid emotions.

GirlCode244.GirlCode_Title: Know That Consistency Is the Bare Minimum
GirlCode244.GirlCode_Details: A man worth having shows up the same way—reliably and intentionally—every single day.

GirlCode245.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept Ultimatums About Your Choices
GirlCode245.GirlCode_Details: Forcing you to choose between him and your dreams, friends, or family is manipulative.

GirlCode246.GirlCode_Title: Support Her Creating a Life She Loves
GirlCode246.GirlCode_Details: A life full of purpose, friends, and joy is better than any relationship.

GirlCode247.GirlCode_Title: Don't Ignore His Discomfort With Your Independence
GirlCode247.GirlCode_Details: A secure man wants you to have your own life, money, and identity.

GirlCode248.GirlCode_Title: Know That You Don't Owe Anyone Your Time
GirlCode248.GirlCode_Details: Saying no to dates, calls, or plans is your right. You don't need to justify it.

GirlCode249.GirlCode_Title: Don't Accept His Pressure to Share Everything
GirlCode249.GirlCode_Details: You're allowed to have privacy, secrets, and a life he doesn't need to know about.

GirlCode250.GirlCode_Title: Be Her Greatest Advocate and Believer
GirlCode250.GirlCode_Details: When no one else gets it, when she doubts herself—you believe in her completely.
